INSERT INTO map.convenience_store ( objt_id, fclty_cd, fclty_nm, adres, rn_adres, sgg_cd, emd_cd, ctprvn_cd, telno, fclty_ty, data_yr, x, y, -- ← 3857로 변환된 값 저장 raw, geom, -- ← EPSG:3857 저장 created_at, updated_at ) SELECT v.objt_id, v.fclty_cd, v.fclty_nm, v.adres, v.rn_adres, v.sgg_cd, v.emd_cd, v.ctprvn_cd, v.telno, v.fclty_ty, v.data_yr,
CASE WHEN g.geom_3857 IS NOT NULL THEN ST_X(g.geom_3857) END AS x, CASE WHEN g.geom_3857 IS NOT NULL THEN ST_Y(g.geom_3857) END AS y,
v.raw,
g.geom_3857 AS geom,
now(), now() FROM ( VALUES
( CAST(#{i.objtId} AS bigint), #{i.fcltyCd}, #{i.fcltyNm}, #{i.adres}, #{i.rnAdres}, #{i.sggCd}, #{i.emdCd}, #{i.ctprvnCd}, #{i.telno}, #{i.fcltyTy}, CAST(#{i.dataYr} AS integer), CAST(#{i.x} AS double precision), -- 입력: 4326 lon CAST(#{i.y} AS double precision), -- 입력: 4326 lat CAST(#{i.rawJson} AS jsonb) )
) AS v( objt_id, fclty_cd, fclty_nm, adres, rn_adres, sgg_cd, emd_cd, ctprvn_cd, telno, fclty_ty, data_yr, x, y, raw ) /* 4326 → 3857 변환을 한 번만 계산해서 재사용 */ CROSS JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT CASE WHEN v.x IS NOT NULL AND v.y IS NOT NULL THEN ST_Transform(ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(v.x, v.y), 4326), 3857) ELSE NULL END AS geom_3857 ) AS g LEFT JOIN map.convenience_store cs ON cs.objt_id = v.objt_id WHERE cs.objt_id IS NULL
